jd: From: Devyani Kumari, Absolute IT devyani@absoluting.com Reply to: devyani@absoluting.com Title: Project Manager (Conversion Salary - $110-117k/yr, Candidate must be a local for hybrid in Woonsocket, RI)Location: Woonsocket, RI – must be comfortable in a hybrid model 3 days per week (Tuesday-Thursday) OR Wellesley, MA office Location Details: 1 CVS Drive, Woonsocket, RI 02895 OR 93 Worcester St, Wellesley, MA 02481Candidate must have an actrive and an updated LinkedIn ID with a picture and current location updated (REQUIRED!!)Duration: Budget through Q3 2025Interview Process: 2 round virtual interviews Background Check:7 year criminal (federal, county, state)Employment verification – 7 yearsEducation verificationHours / Shift: Monday- Friday, regular business hoursCandidate must have experience working with kidney dialysis and at-home services like Davita, Baxter, Nxtstage, Satellite Healthcare etc..Day to Day:The typical IT PM experience is not a good fit for the Business Consulting role. IT PM is more of a task master where the Business PM expands much more.They need 5-10 years of experience with larger programs.Excellent Communication Skills are required!!
